description: This file defines the AppInitializer class which implements the AndroidX Startup Initializer interface. Its purpose is to initialize the ServiceLocator during application startup by calling ServiceLocator.init with the application context.

classes.name: AppInitializer
classes.description: A class that implements the AndroidX Initializer interface to initialize the ServiceLocator during app startup.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Initializes the ServiceLocator with the application context.

methods.name: dependencies
methods.description: Returns a list of dependencies for this initializer, empty in this case.
